titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of September 2024 as "National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Month", and raising awareness and understanding of polycystic kidney disease.
Expressing support for the designation of September 2024 as "National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Month", and raising awareness and understanding of polycystic kidney disease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Month.
